title: Gamification Education for Intangible Cultural Heritage: Cultural Transmission Through Northeast Indian Tribal Textiles

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding foundational concepts of cultural heritage and basic proficiency in digital device usage
context.additional_context: Conducted as Part of Corporate Multicultural Understanding Enhancement and Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) Programs

learning_goals: Learners can explain the cultural significance of traditional textiles and oral folktales in Northeastern Indian tribal societies
Learners can design digital transmission methods for intangible cultural heritage using gamification techniques
Learners can produce reports presenting the social value of cultural heritage preservation through project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
